tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces
Interface IEvent

public interface IEvent

IEvent is the value object for carrying out event info:

Method Summary
 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getData()
          Get the data information of this event.
 java.lang.String getType()
          Get the type of this event.
 

Method Detail

getType

java.lang.String getType()
Get the type of this event.

Returns:
type string, can be one of:
IConstants.EVENT_REQUEST_COMPLETE
IConstants.EVENT_REQUEST_CONTENT_VIDEO_PAUSE
IConstants.EVENT_REQUEST_CONTENT_VIDEO_RESUME
IConstants.EVENT_SLOT_ENDED
IConstants.EVENT_SLOT_STARTED

getData

java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getData()
Get the data information of this event.

Returns:
data as an HashMap Object Note: the key of the data as following:

IConstants.INFO_KEY_MESSAGE :all event will contain this
IConstants.INFO_KEY_CUSTOM_ID :IConstants.EVENT_SLOT_ENDED/IConstants.EVENT_SLOT_STARTED will contain this
